item.content:encoded:
Items of Interest #57: The Undiscovered Country

This is the final Items of Interest to grace the hallowed (sort of) halls of Multiple Mentality. In it, you will find an explanation, and many interesting articles to read.

…

item.content:encoded:
Infinite Trackback Loop

AFK Gamer is hosting this month’s Carnival of Gamers, which has now been posted. Go on and check it out, there’s a lot of interesting stuff there.

item.dc:creator: Pure Digital Thought » Carnival of Gamers at AFKGamer
item.description: [...] The Carnival of Gamers has taken hold at AFKGamer this month. When at the carnival, do as the carnies do. Game design, critiques, memories, interviews and just plain strangeness all await you at AFKGamer. [...]

item.title: By: Walkerings
item.dc:creator: Walkerings
item.description:
<strong>ZombieMUDs Walk the Earth (and other headlines)</strong>
MUDs ain't dead yet -- unless they're Urban Dead, that is. Thanks, Kotaku, for alerting us to this cool new browser-based, text-and-buttons MMO, in which you can play as either survivor or victim of a zombie outbreak in the quarantined
item.content:encoded:
ZombieMUDs Walk the Earth (and other headlines)

MUDs ain’t dead yet — unless they’re Urban Dead, that is. Thanks, Kotaku, for alerting us to this cool new browser-based, text-and-buttons MMO, in which you can play as either survivor or victim of a zombie outbreak in the quarantined
